definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Vector" id="vec_player">vec_player</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_vector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:vec_player</field><value name="VAL"><block type="vector_create"><value name="x"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:Pos_player_x</field></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="z"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:Pos_player_z</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="return_vector"><value name="return"><block type="vector_operate"><field name="operator">-</field><value name="left"><block type="vector_create"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></value><value name="right"><block type="variables_get_vector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:vec_player</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
